scripts.dev:mac: mode=development minimize=false webpack --config webpack.config.js --env development --env minimize=false
scripts.build:mac: mode=production minimize=true webpack --config webpack.config.js --env production --env minimize
scripts.dev:windows: set mode=development&&set minimize=false&&webpack --config webpack.config.js --env development --env minimize=false
scripts.build:windows: set mode=production&&set minimize=true&&webpack --config webpack.config.js --env production --env minimize
